ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: 'Enter them in peace, in complete security!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Enter in peace and tranquility," (they will be told).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They will be told: "Enter it in peace and security."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and they will be told to enter there in peace and safety.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (It will be said to them): "Enter it in peace and security."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Enter you them, in peace and security!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (And it is said unto them): Enter them in peace, secure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Enter therein in peace and security!" --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (Their greeting will be): "Enter ye here in peace and security."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (It will be said to them): 'Enter therein (Paradise), in peace and security.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: In peace and security, enter them'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Having been told], "Enter it in peace, safe [and secure]."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:46] And it shall be said to them: ‘Enter them in peace, that is, safe from all danger — or [it means enter] with [the greeting of] ‘Peace!’, in other words: say, ‘Peace’ and then enter, secure!’, from all terror.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: ((And it is said unto them): Enter them) Allah, Exalted is He, will say to them on the Day of Judgement: enter Paradise (in peace) with peace and greetings; it is also said that this means: with safety and redemption from Us, (secure) from death and evanescence.
